definitions.definition: A short heavy club with a rounded head used as a weapon .
examples: The guard hefted his cudgel menacingly and looked at the inmates.

definitions.definition: Anything that can be used as a threat to force one's will on another.

main_definition: A short heavy club with a rounded head used as a weapon .
secondary_definitions: ( figurative ) Anything that can be used as a threat to force one's will on another.
